TextView.android:text: Why do I have to purchase a server?

No website or app will run without a server. Here are some reasons why you need a server:

1. You need a server to upload your database.

2. Generated QR code images will be stored in server storage.

3. Your app can respond to all activities only with the help of a server.

4. All your work-related details and earnings will be saved on the server.
